whatIs.question: What is Next-AI SaaS?
whatIs.answer: Next-AI SaaS is a platform that provides AI-powered text transformation services. You can convert text into emojis and more.

credits.question: How do credits work?
credits.answer: Each AI generation consumes 1 credit. Free users receive 100 credits on signup. Pro users receive 1000 credits monthly.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my plan anytime?
upgrade.answer: Yes, you can upgrade from Free to Pro at any time. Your new benefits will be available immediately.

privacy.question: How is my data protected?
privacy.answer: We take data privacy seriously. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and never shared with third parties.

outOfCredits.question: What happens when I run out of credits?
outOfCredits.answer: When your credits reach zero, you will not be able to generate new content until you receive more credits or upgrade your plan.
